data.title: Great home cooked meal!
data.text: Rich foods, small town diner feeling when you walk in. Grab a lunch tray, order at the counter, the guys cook the food for you and pay! Seat yourself, and after a waitress clears your dishes! Amazing concept and great food!

data.title: A1
data.text: Good Food good portions and great guys that know you when you come in.  Tony & Bobby are Brothers and John is always there too.  This time I got a chocolate chip pancake and a side of bacon.

data.title: WONDERFUL LOCAL RESTAURANT
data.text: Visit The A1 Deli if you are in Haverhill, Massachusetts. A great local restaurant with WONDERFUL food at a reasonable price. A favorite among the locals

data.title: A1
data.text: Had  Another wonderful meal. again.  Usually do breakfast but did lunch this time.  Had a yummy roast beef dinner with gravy, rice and broccoli au grautin.  Very tasty and good portions.

data.title: one of the hidden gems of Haverhill
data.text:
well, not really hidden, because it's right there on Merrimack Street, but it doesn't look like much from the outside. And yet, i find myself goig back again and again for their comfort food and sense of community- and when friends come in from out of town, they always want to go there for a meal. Their breakfasts are to die for. Great omlettes, which a big pile of hash browns and your choice of 5 or 6 different kinds of toast. Paancakes and waffles, Just no fryolator for breakfast, so nothing deep fried. but then there's lunch. with onion rings acrispy fries, and the mains are amazing. Roast beef,lamb, pork and  turkey like for thanksgiving. pork Chops, BBQ ribs, Stuffed cabbage.New England boiled dinner. Corned beef & Cabbage. and the portions are so large that I almost always take home enough for at least one and usually two more meals. the veggie sides are fresh, not canned. the desserts are in glass displays as you come in for you to help yourself. and if you want waitress service there's a small cafe next door. Prices are very reasonable for the portion size.
during the summer , it's shorter hours and breakfast only on Sundays- so if you want one of their meals for sunday dinner, stop by Saturday evening and take one home so you won't be disappointed. the Deli is open 6:30 AM- 9 PM monday - Saturday and 7:30 AM- 1 PM on SUnday. Friday and Saturday they do a fish chowder that is a meal in itself. stop by and bring your appetite. you'll go back again and again.

data.title: A-1 should be a Haverhill historic landmark
data.text: A-1 has great food in an old school deli counter setting, the food is great, the guests are great, and all at a fair price.  My grandmother, 17 years years gone, was a huge fan of the roast pork dinner.  I remember her by going in and getting that same dinner today!

data.title: Well worth the money!
data.text: I really like the food here.  It is family owned and has a nice environment.  There are two sides with the right side being cafeteria style where you grab a tray and walk up to the counter and tell them what you want and slide down the line.  I only went there once and like the other side which is table service.  They have a full bar which is nice and even a bar you can sit down at if you are going solo.  I love the veal parmesian sandwiches.  You can get two meals out of it and the steak fries are great.

data.title: Leaves too much to be desired
data.text: If you are into frozen products,  sauce that tastes like it came from a can, and poor quality food,  then this is the place for you.  They do try to make up for it with generous portions, however,  having more of lousy food doesn't cut it.  The best part of our experience was the waitress- Paula-  very quick , friendly and a pretty face to look at.  Sorry folks-   This was just an awful meal and don't care to talk about it further.  If you DO try it-  you have been cautioned!

data.title: A1 Deli
data.text: Got one Huge Chocolate Chip Pancake and a side of Bacon.  Yummy as always. Nice cup of hot tea also. The place is always hopping.

data.title: Feels like home
data.text: This resturant makes you feel like Momma or Pop are cooking...great food, great atmosphere and specials every day.  Worth coming to and experiencing home like food.

data.title: great place for lunch
data.text: I went there with my son I law and daughter it was very good, the staff were friendley and it was like the old time delis.

data.title: A1 Deli
data.text: Breakfast. This time I got  1 scrambled egg, Bacon and home fries.  Great food and portions as always and I got a grilled English muffin too.

data.title: food on a budget
data.text: The guys on the line are friendly food is always good menu for food ready needs to change up at times but what they do serve is always good. they do have a side that you can be waited on

data.title: Great restaurant
data.text: The people are amiable, friendly, willing to help, the food is just right and tasty, portions are large and prices are affordable.  No lunch or dinner on Sunday.

data.title: Great place and great value.
data.text: Great people, and friendly servers the food is delicious and the portions are large  with a great menu,

data.title: A true family style resturant!
data.text:
I don't care where you go to eat, there is nothing like home made food and you'll find it here!  These wonderful Greek people work very, very hard to serve you the best Greek and American food.  Their extended menu is quite large and you can order almost anything, and if is not eactly what you want, they'll make if for you!  This Greek family goes out of their way to accommodate your needs.  The staff can be very funny and joke with you.  Everything is extremely clean and fresh.  The prices are great for what you get.
There's a quick resturant when you walk in, then there's a more formal resturant next to that, if you perfer lower lights and privacy and if you want to have a Christmas party, mercy meal or larger accomendations for friends, you can always choose upstairs!  The food is very good, I highly recommend this resturant.

data.title: Ehhhhh....
data.text: It's ok, just don't expect the best meal ever. It's like a diner. The people here are really nice though. Haven't tried breakfast, so I can't say anything about that.

data.title: Hefty Portions
data.text: Their food tastes like a home cooked meal. Great variety on their menu and if you can't make up your mind - the staff will suggest great recommendations. Xome hungry leave happy m

data.title: A1 Deli
data.text: This time went for lunch split a roast beef diner and a huge bowl of seafood chowder.  Both amazing and got an extra side of butternut squash  along with rice and corn and lots of gravy .

data.title: Homecooking Meals !
data.text: A 1 Deli is the place to go if you like a feeling of a good ole Fashion Home Cooked Meal. The Longtime Owners take pride in putting out great tasting & great quality meal ! Portions are Fantastic !
